block.p: WEISS-Harry. Of Berlin, Paris, Marseilles, Dallas, New York and citizen of the world. On July 14, 2000. Beloved husband of the late Susan Weiss and adored and adoring husband of Jean S. Weiss. Dear father of Judith and Michael. Much loved brother of Alfred and Ava Weiss. Cherished uncle. Services Sunday, July 16, 9:45 AM at ''The Riverside'', 76th Street and Amsterdam Avenue.

Dear father of Judith and Michael. Much loved brother of Alfred and Ava Weiss. Cherished uncle. Services Sunday, July 16, 9:45 AM at ''The Riverside'', 76th Street and Amsterdam Avenue.
